trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Vertegenwoordigt een verzameling <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection gebruiken om te doorlopen van een verzameling van <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objecten.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: U kunt toegang tot deze verzameling van objecten met behulp van de <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>eigenschap of de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection wordt ook gebruikt bij het maken van aangepaste typen die een uitbreiding van de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>klasse.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Voegt een <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> -object op voor dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Standaard met deze methode wordt de opgegeven <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>object als deze niet al is opgenomen binnen de verzameling.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object dat moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object dat moet worden toegevoegd.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wist u de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode is een wrapper rond de <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>methode.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kopieert <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object aan een array.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the object to.
trans-unit.target: De matrix, zodat het object te kopiëren.

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: De indexlocatie waarop u wilt beginnen met het kopiëren.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
trans-unit.target: De lengte van array kleiner is dan de waarde van plus index .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt het aantal sectiegroepen in de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Een geheel getal dat het aantal sectiegroepen in de verzameling vertegenwoordigt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object in de collectie.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode is een wrapper rond de <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>methode.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: De opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object uit de verzameling.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode is een wrapper rond de <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>methode.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object met de opgegeven naam.

trans-unit.source: name is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameis null of een lege tekenreeks ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een enumerator die kunt doorlopen haalt de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>die kunnen worden gebruikt om te doorlopen de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De sleutel van de opgegeven opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objecten van dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de sectiegroep waarvan de sleutel moet worden geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De sleutel van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Wordt gebruikt door het systeem tijdens serialisatie.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: De methode GetObjectData, komen wordt gebruikt tijdens de serialisatie; dat wil zeggen, wanneer het behouden blijven van configuratiegegevens naar een configuratiebestand.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De toepasselijke <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: De toepasselijke <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>object.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object waarvan de index van de verzameling is opgegeven.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De index van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object in de opgegeven index.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: In C#, is deze eigenschap de indexeerfunctie voor de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object waarvan de naam van de verzameling is opgegeven.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object wordt geretourneerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object met de opgegeven naam.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: In C#, is deze eigenschap de indexeerfunctie voor de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: De sleutels voor alle opgehaald <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objecten in dit <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>-object dat de namen van alle sectiegroepen in deze verzameling bevat.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee verwijdert u de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object waarvan de naam van deze is opgegeven <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The name of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de sectiegroep moet worden verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee verwijdert u de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> object waarvan de index wordt opgegeven van deze <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: De index van de sectiegroep moet worden verwijderd.
